messages.title: Local housing
messages.content: There is a shortage of affordable homes in Poplar & Limehouse. Only the Lib Dems will significantly increase the number of homes built.

messages.title: Jobs and growth
messages.content: The Tories want further cuts to benefits, while Labour will put the recovery at risk. Only the Lib Dems are committed to building a stronger economy and a fairer society.

messages.title: Local health
messages.content: GP surgeries in Poplar & Limehouse are struggling with funding cuts. Only the Lib Dems will provide the NHS with £8bn of extra funding.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Increase the number of affordable homes built in Poplar & Limehouse.
Avoid further cuts to benefits and build a stronger economy and a fairer society.
Provide NHS with £8bn of extra funding to help GP surgeries in Poplar & Limehouse.

issues.economy: Avoid further cuts to benefits and build a stronger economy and a fairer society.
issues.health: Provide NHS with £8bn of extra funding to help GP surgeries in Poplar & Limehouse.

housing.content: Increase the number of affordable homes built in Poplar & Limehouse.

images.caption: Elaine Bagshaw and your local Lib Dem Team working hard here all year round!

leaflet.additionalNotes: There is a section to take part in a local survey, asking about the most important local issue, issues the candidate should focus on, opinion on Britain's EU membership, and rating the Mayor of Tower Hamlets.
